input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: SĘPOLNO KRAJEŃSKIE COMMUNE. Summary: Organizing and Managing the Paid Parking Zone in Sępolno Krajeńskie. Description: 1. The subject of the order is the service of organizing, equipping and administering Paid Parking Zones in Splno Krajeski. The contractor is obliged to launch the Paid Parking Zone within 30 days from the date of signing the contract. The rules for the operation of the Paid Parking Zone have been changed specified in Resolution No. XIX/154/2025 of the City Council in Splno Krajeski of September 24, 2025 on determining the paid parking zone and the amount of vehicle parking fees and the method of collecting these fees (Journal of Laws of the Kuj. Pom. Province, item 4384 of October 1, 2025). The Ordering Party allows changes to the applicable resolution, which may not give rise to the Contractor's claims against the Ordering Party, and an increase in the Contractor's remuneration. The Paid Parking Zone in Splno Krajeski includes the following streets: Plac Wolnoci, Myska, Nowy Rynek, Jeziorna. The estimated number of parking spaces in SPP is 97. Fees will be collected from Monday to Friday from 9.00 a.m. to 5.00 p.m., excluding public holidays. A detailed description of the subject of the order is included in Appendix No. 6 to SWZ.. Published Date: 2025-11-07. Closing Date: 2025-11-18. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

The Ordering Party allows changes to the applicable resolution, which may not give rise to the Contractor's claims against the Ordering Party, and an increase in the Contractor's remuneration. The Paid Parking Zone in Splno Krajeski includes the following streets: Plac Wolnoci, Myska, Nowy Rynek, Jeziorna. The estimated number of parking spaces in SPP is 97. Fees will be collected from Monday to Friday from 9.00 a.m. to 5.00 p.m., excluding public holidays. A detailed description of the subject of the order is included in Appendix No. 6 to SWZ.

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: MUNICIPAL SOCIAL WELFARE CENTER IN PŁOCK. Summary: Organizing and Providing Care Services in the City of Płock in 2026.. Description: The subject of the order is the provision of care services, specialized care services (excluding specialized care services for people with mental disorders), including those awarded urgently in accordance with Art. 50 and 50a of the Act of March 12, 2004. on social assistance (i.e. Journal Laws of 2025, item 1214, as amended) and intervention services in the city of Płock in the period from January 1, 2026 to December 31, 2026. Care services will be provided to single people living in the city of Płock who, due to age, illness or other reasons, require assistance other people and are deprived of it, and people who require the help of other people and the family, as well as the spouse, ascendants or descendants who do not live together cannot provide such help. The Ordering Party anticipates that approximately 150,000 hours of care services will be provided during the period specified in the contract, including approximately 1,000 hours of specialized care services and approximately 500 hours of emergency care services. The minimum annual number of hours that will be assigned to the Contractor will be 75,000 hours during the period covered by the contract.<br> Organizing and providing care services in the city of Płock 2026<br> Doc Title: Organizing and providing care services in the city of Płock in 2026.<br> Contract Type: services. Published Date: 2025-11-06. Closing Date: 2025-11-26. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

The Contractor guarantees high quality products (i.e. the delivered products will be GMO-free), with valid expiration dates and quantities in accordance with the dietitian's order. The method of implementation is specified in section 5.2. point 1 of the SWZ. The conditions for preparing meals are specified in chapter 5.2. point 2 of SWZ. Summary: Providing Physiotherapist Services to Project Participants at the Day Care Center in Stare Dzierzgoń. Description: . The subject of the order is the provision of physiotherapy services for 15 people - project participants - dependent and elderly people (including at least 5 people with disabilities) at the Day Care Home in Stary Dzierzgoń, 82-450 Stary Dzierzgo. Classes with physiotherapists are aimed at: general improvement of motor condition, reduction or elimination of pain problems, improvement of the efficiency of the respiratory system, circulatory system, nervous system, minimizing the risk of falls, supporting independence, has a relaxing effect on the muscle-ligament structures. The Day Care Center in Stary Dzierzgoń is open is from 8.00 a.m. to 3.00 p.m., on weekdays. The working time of a physiotherapist is on average 50 hours per month (15 people x 3/4 hours per month) for the duration of the contract, i.e. 21 months from the date of signing the contract, i.e. a total of 1,080 hours. Working days and hours will be agreed between the Contractor and the Contractor to the ordering party for each month, by preparing a monthly schedule. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: GENERAL DIRECTORATE FOR NATIONAL ROADS AND MOTORWAYS. Summary: Conducting Ongoing Maintenance and Repairs of the Measurement System Located on Roads Managed by the Gddkia Branch in Lublin, Along with Providing Data, over a Period of 18 Months.. Description: The subject of the contract is the ongoing maintenance and repairs of the measurement system located on roads managed by GDDKiA Branch in Lublin, including the provision of data, over a period of 18 months. Comprehensive ongoing maintenance of the measurement system includes activities enabling for uninterrupted operation of the system in accordance with OPZ requirements, including the provision of data recorded by the measurement system devices and data exchange with the Ordering Party's Regional Traffic Management System (RSZR). Maintenance activities include, among others: maintenance and continuous maintenance efficiency and proper technical condition of all elements constituting the measurement system, in particular the technical and software infrastructure, collecting recorded data and performing auxiliary activities, i.e. calibration and verification tests ensuring the achievement of required accuracy of data provided by stations. The maintenance of the measurement system also includes ensuring the collection, exchange and transmission of data to and from measurement stations, as well as all activities related to ensuring the proper functioning of individual station modules, including signs and variable message boards constituting part of the measuring station infrastructure. Maintaining the measurement system also includes repairs to the infrastructure and equipment of the measurement system necessary to maintain proper technical condition and ensure continuity deliver.... Published Date: 2025-11-06. Closing Date: 2025-12-11. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Summary: Security and Medical Support Service for the 9Th Edition of the Silesian Science Festival in Katowice and Protection during Assembly and Disassembly. Description: 1) The subject of the order is the provision of a service consisting in ensuring the safety of all persons participating in the 9th Silesian Science Festival KATOWICE, hereinafter referred to as the Festival, organized by the University of Silesia, implemented in the form of direct physical protection in the building and on the premises around the facility, preventive patrols, property protection, medical security with the support of an ambulance, medical patrol and cloakroom staff.2) The festival is a popular science event and is not treated as a mass event within the meaning of the Act on the Safety of Mass Events. Summary: Running an Educational and Support Group as Part of the Project "Social Services in Siemianowice Śląskie. Description: 1) The subject of the order is to run an educational and support group for 15 actual caregivers as part of the project entitled Social services in Siemianowice lskie. The aim of the educational support group meetings is to improve the competences of actual caregivers of people requiring support in everyday functioning, residents of Siemianowice lskie, in the care of people who are dependent due to age, disability or health condition. Within the group, participants will have the opportunity to exchange their own experiences and jointly look for solutions to their problems.2) Meetings within the educational support group include a total of 60 clock hours, not less than 40 clock hours. Meetings will be held on average once a month for 2 hours. The group will be open, i.e. you can join it at any time during the project. Therefore, the number of people participating in the group varies. By During the entire duration of the Agreement, 15 actual guardians are expected to participate.. Published Date: 2025-11-05. The tent should have a steel structure and be inflated with air using a foot pump, an electric compressor or a compressed air cylinder. air, which allows its installation in various weather conditions. (within the minimum external temperature range from -30C to +55C). input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: CITY OF GORZOW WLKP.. Summary: Providing Services Consisting in Confirming Death, Issuing a Death Certificate and Determining its Causes to Persons who Died Within the Administrative Boundaries of the City of Gorzow Wielkopolski.. Description: The subject of the order is a service consisting in confirming death, issuing a death certificate and determining its causes in situations referred to in Art. 11 of the Act of January 31, 1959 on cemeteries and burial of the dead (consolidated text: Journal of Laws of 2024, item 576, as amended), regulation of the Minister of Health and Welfare Social of August 3, 1961 regarding the declaration of death and its causes (Journal of Laws of 1961, No. 39, item 202) and in accordance with the Acts of November 28, 2014, Law on Civil Status Records (consolidated text: Journal of Laws of 2025, item 594, as amended) within the administrative boundaries of the City of Gorzow Wielkopolski commissioned to the Contractor by an officer of the appropriate Police unit or an officer of the City Guard Headquarters by telephone. The subject of the order concerns cases where: 1) it is impossible to determine the primary health care doctor or the doctor treating the deceased in the last illness, and the death has not been confirmed confirmed by a doctor called in the event of an accident or sudden illness; 2) an established primary care doctor or a doctor treating the deceased in the last illness refuses to confirm the death. Order execution period: from the date of signing the contract. Agreement zawi.. Published Date: 2025-11-04. Closing Date: 2025-11-14. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Providing Services Consisting in Confirming Death, Issuing a Death Certificate and Determining its Causes to Persons who Died Within the Administrative Boundaries of the City of Gorzow Wielkopolski.
output.Description: The subject of the order is a service consisting in confirming death, issuing a death certificate and determining its causes in situations referred to in Art. 11 of the Act of January 31, 1959 on cemeteries and burial of the dead (consolidated text: Journal of Laws of 2024, item 576, as amended), regulation of the Minister of Health and Welfare Social of August 3, 1961 regarding the declaration of death and its causes (Journal of Laws of 1961, No. 39, item 202) and in accordance with the Acts of November 28, 2014, Law on Civil Status Records (consolidated text: Journal of Laws of 2025, item 594, as amended) within the administrative boundaries of the City of Gorzow Wielkopolski commissioned to the Contractor by an officer of the appropriate Police unit or an officer of the City Guard Headquarters by telephone. The subject of the order concerns cases where: 1) it is impossible to determine the primary health care doctor or the doctor treating the deceased in the last illness, and the death has not been confirmed confirmed by a doctor called in the event of an accident or sudden illness; 2) an established primary care doctor or a doctor treating the deceased in the last illness refuses to confirm the death. The subject of the order is the execution of decorative and artistic works at an archaeological exhibition (including a merchant's stall, a latrine, a skeleton grave) and the execution of an exhibition with multi-colored painting decorations using UV ink (light-curable) techniques, together with the preparation of the base on a wall painted with white paint. at permanent exhibitions and communication routes (according to the attached template) and making descriptive and graphic boards for the permanent exhibition of history, history of art, weapons and art of Japan, history of lighting, i.e. Design and creation of descriptive boards with graphic elementsb. Design and implementation plastic arrangements 2. Before starting work related to the arrangement, it is necessary to obtain the Ordering Party's approval in terms of the selection of materials, colors and execution techniques.3. Subject to the provisions of the SWZ, materials and equipment necessary to complete the subject of the order fully secured by the Contractor. 4. The Contractor will prepare the designs necessary to complete the subject of the order at the price of the submitted offer. 5. A detailed description of the subject of the order is provided in Appendix No. 1 to SWZ.. Published Date: 2025-11-01. Closing Date: 2025-11-12. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Arranging Exhibitions and Making Artistic Decorations.

Description: UTM device 3 pieces The security system performs all the network and security functions listed below, regardless of the connection provider. Individual elements of the security system can be implemented in the form of separate, commercial hardware platforms or commercial applications installed on general-purpose platforms. In the case of software implementation, the necessary hardware platforms must be provided along with an appropriately secured operating system. For all system functions, a document confirmed by the manufacturer must be provided an authorized distributor ready to provide support services in Polish and free service of the replacement process of a damaged device. The system implementing the Firewall function ensures operation in one of three modes: Router with NAT function, transparent and monitoring on the SPAN port. The system allows construction of at least 2 separate (physical or logical) instances of systems in the field of: Routing, Firewall, IPSec VPN, Antivirus, IPS, Application Control. It should be possible to dedicate at least 4 administrators to individual instances of the system.System support.... Published Date: 2025-11-01. Closing Date: 2025-11-12. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: KATOWICE ONCOLOGY CENTER. Summary: Purchase and Delivery of an in Vivo Cherenkov Radiation Imaging System for the Katowice Oncology Center. Description: 1. The subject of the order is the purchase and delivery of an in vivo Cherenkov radiation imaging system for the Katowice Oncology Center, in accordance with Annex No. 2 to the SWZ - Price Offer.<br> 2. The subject of the contract is the delivery, installation and clinical implementation of a radiation imaging system Cherenkov, enabling real-time monitoring of the administered dose and control of the patient's positioning during radiotherapy. The system allows you to visualize the beam distribution on the patient's body, verify the correct use of boluses and other accessories, and archive video recordings of each therapy session.<br> The device integrated with the SGRT system will be used in AOS, which will increase the safety and throughput of services.<br> 3. The technical and functional parameters of the equipment are specified in Annex No. 4 to the SWZ.<br> The order also includes:<br> 1) Delivery of the system (hereinafter referred to as the equipment SWZ) to destination,<br> 2)installation, commissioning,<br> 3) connection of the supplied equipment along with integration with SGRT and accelerators<br> in the possession of the Ordering Party,<br> 4) Ensuring system compatibility with medical documentation and DICOM standards.<br> 5)Providing compliant clinical updates with new AAPM and IEC guidelines.<br> 6) staff training in the use of the system, interpretation of Cherenkov images and reporting of results.<br> 7) Transfer of medical equipment for use along with all necessary approvals, certificates, software and perpetual licenses for software.... Published Date: 2025-10-31. Closing Date: 2025-12-11. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed
